author: Ember
name: Council of the Dead
bootlegger: At the start of N4, dead wake together for 2 min, then secretly vote on a living player (if there's no majority, the ST chooses). The chosen player gets a boon.

name: Council of the Dead
ability: At the start of N4, dead wake together for 2 min, then secretly vote on a living player (if there's no majority, the ST chooses). The chosen player gets a boon.
otherNightReminder: If it is Night 4, wake the dead together and let them talk for 2 minutes. Then have the dead players secretly vote for a living player. Whichever player is selected, give that player a boon.
